channel.title: I need magic in wildy, to react on the mage def bonus, not the slash,stab etc
channel.description: when maging in wildy ( P16V6) the mage doesnt work cause the other player has high def bonus ON SLASH<STAB<CRUSH! Mage def doesnt affect nothing, how can i fix this?
